CustomField.description:
Formulafield with values( EMPTY, 0 and 1):
- 0, when the Project has the Contract Types: Core Competence Partnership (C2P), Data Privacy (DP), Letter of Intent (LOI), Master Research Agreement (MRA) ,Non Disclosure Agreement (NDA) OR Software Licence (SWLIC). - 1 if Number of Deliverables is greater zero - EMPTY in all other cases.
With the EMPTY value the Stage Key field shows "Add Deliverables".
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c, "C2P"), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c, "DP"), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c, "LOI"), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c, "MRA"), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c, "NDA"), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c, "SWLIC") ), 0, IF( NumberOfDeliverables__c > 0, 1, NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Add Deliverables
